titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for reliefe of the poore, and remedying the high prices of corne.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Requiring observance of "Orders appointed by his Majestie for preventing dearth of graine" (STC 9242.5).
Dated at end: ... Whitehall, the two and twentieth day of December, in the twentieth yeere of our reigne ... .
Steele notation: 1) of Countries, 2) po- that. Arms 14 (with the initials IR).
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
